snippets: Nitrofurantoin 100 mg modified‑release twice daily for 7 days is first‑line for lower urinary tract infection in pregnancy, except at term (38–42 weeks) due to neonatal haemolysis risk. (NICE NG109, 2023)
If nitrofurantoin unsuitable, use amoxicillin/clavulanate guided by culture results. (BNF Antibacterials in pregnancy, accessed 20 Jun 2025)
